>
[Master Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5105) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 222 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=217)

**Prerequisites**
[Expert Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5104); legendary in the skill associated with your patron's tradition

</column>

---

You gain the master [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132).
